data.what_is:
Lemnisk's Customer Data Platform-led personalization and real-time marketing automation solution delivers superior customer experiences that result in increased conversions, retention, and growth for enterprises. The key capabilities include:
 *     No code connectors to bring together silo-ed marketing data sources and create a real-time one view of every customer
*     Orchestrate individual customer journeys across the marketing tool ecosystem on the right channels at the right time using a proprietary in-built machine learning engine
*     Create 1:1 personalized experiences for each user across multiple marketing channels

Lemnisk has offices in Boston, Singapore, Dubai, and Bangalore. Lemnisk is ISO 27001 and ISO 27018 certified.

For more information, please visit: www.lemnisk.co
data.product_description: Lemnisk is the world's first real-time marketing automation built on an intelligent & secure Customer Data Platform orchestrating 1-to-1 personalization and cross-channel customer journeys at scale that increases conversions, retention & growth for enterprises.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lemnisk?
Lemnisk's CDP empowers businesses with valuable data-driven strategies, leading to improved customer engagement.

Lemnisk distinguishes itself with its responsive and experienced managed services team

Real-time data segmentation and cohorting capabilities ensure a comprehensive view of customer behavior

What do you dislike about Lemnisk?
Lemnisk's dashboards, while functional, offer an opportunity for modernization to enhance the overall user experience.

What problems is Lemnisk solving and how is that benefiting you?
Effective Data Handling

Individualized Customer Interactions

Economical Pricing Model

Dynamic Client Collaboration

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lemnisk?
Overall amazing product and great service, Easy personalisation, Flexible and supportive staff.

What do you dislike about Lemnisk?
Nothing as we have using this tool for more than a year now, And Dashboard is also getting new features

What problems is Lemnisk solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalized Communications, increase in no. leads, Creating Customer Journey through multiple channels

initial_reviews.review_title: Customer one view is the key for improving efficiency
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lemnisk?
customization is the best thing I like about Lemnisk. I am able to have product that can be moulded as per my requirement to achieve my goals.

What do you dislike about Lemnisk?
Reporting dashboard is a big area for improvement also the tool has to become more self serve rather then being dependent on the team for data to analyse things more

What problems is Lemnisk solving and how is that benefiting you?
At Coverfox the biggest problem to solve was personalizing the user experience and having a dynamic journey with an omni channel creative approach that helps save on media cost and deliver great efficiency and better user experience. Other problem was to bridge the online to offline gap by mapping the user cookie to the CRM activities of the lead that will help improve quality of prospect and freeup call centre bandwidth that goes on non performing leads.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Lemnisk?
review_question_answers.answer: customization is the best thing I like about Lemnisk. I am able to have product that can be moulded as per my requirement to achieve my goals.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Lemnisk?
review_question_answers.answer: Reporting dashboard is a big area for improvement also the tool has to become more self serve rather then being dependent on the team for data to analyse things more

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Lemnisk solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: At Coverfox the biggest problem to solve was personalizing the user experience and having a dynamic journey with an omni channel creative approach that helps save on media cost and deliver great efficiency and better user experience. Other problem was to bridge the online to offline gap by mapping the user cookie to the CRM activities of the lead that will help improve quality of prospect and freeup call centre bandwidth that goes on non performing leads.

initial_reviews.review_title: Very intuitive tool and amazing customer support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lemnisk?
We have been working with Lemnisk for more than a year now and their products and services are exemplary. They are flexible and supportive with their customer support and go the extra mile when it comes to delivering services and campaigns.

They help us with our systems and suggest new ideas for personalization campaigns as and when required.

We are very happy with their services that has contributed immensely in improving our customer experiences for both online and offline channels.

What do you dislike about Lemnisk?
Their reporting platform was very basic, but now that has been resolved with Tableau reports, Customer One VIew and a Customer Journey builder. Very big improvement in just 2 quarters.

Recommendations to others considering Lemnisk:
Highly recommended

What problems is Lemnisk solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Customization and 1x1 web personalization
- Lead prioritization
- Post sale customer service automation
- Streamlining and optimizing existing sales platforms

We are very happy with their services that has contributed immensely in improving our customer experiences for both online and offline channels.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great personalization Experience. Very useful Customer Data Platform tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lemnisk?
The Personalization Engine and the responsiveness and the activeness of their employees.

What do you dislike about Lemnisk?
Nothing. This is a great product. But I think they should focus more on the Customer Data Platform and getting that implemented across companies. Their main expertise is not being exploited here.

What problems is Lemnisk solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalized Marketing. Increase in Quality Leads and Revenue

review_question_answers.answer: Personalized Marketing. Increase in Quality Leads and Revenue

initial_reviews.review_title: Good tool to unify 1st party data
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lemnisk?
The concept of synchronising user experience across multiple channels

What do you dislike about Lemnisk?
The products is still evolving, but I am sure they will get there

What problems is Lemnisk solving and how is that benefiting you?
Most of our channels were working in silos ... Lemnisk's CDP is helping to resolve that aspect, which in essence creates a powerful user experience

all_reviews.review_title: Very intuitive tool and amazing customer support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Lemnisk?
We have been working with Lemnisk for more than a year now and their products and services are exemplary. They are flexible and supportive with their customer support and go the extra mile when it comes to delivering services and campaigns.

They help us with our systems and suggest new ideas for personalization campaigns as and when required.

We are very happy with their services that has contributed immensely in improving our customer experiences for both online and offline channels.

What do you dislike about Lemnisk?
Their reporting platform was very basic, but now that has been resolved with Tableau reports, Customer One VIew and a Customer Journey builder. Very big improvement in just 2 quarters.

Recommendations to others considering Lemnisk:
Highly recommended

What problems is Lemnisk solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Customization and 1x1 web personalization
- Lead prioritization
- Post sale customer service automation
- Streamlining and optimizing existing sales platforms
